```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

# Somthing simple

```{r}
set.seed(1)

x.vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 3)

(x.vec - mean(x.vec)) / sd(x.vec)

```

 Want a function to compute z scores

```{r}
z.scores = function(x) {
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
}

z.scores(x.vec)
```

Trying function on other things

```{r,error=TRUE}
z.scores(3)
z.scores("Mehoy Nehoy")
z.scores(mtcars)
z.scores(c(TRUE ,TRUE ,FALSE ,TRUE))

```

update function

```{r}

z.scores = function(x) {
  
  if(!is.numeric(x)){
    stop("Input must be numeric")
  }
  

  if(length(x) < 3){
    stop("Input must have at least 3 numbers")
  }
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
}


```

 These should guve errors
```{r, error=TRUE}
z.scores(3)
z.scores("Mehoy Nehoy")
z.scores(mtcars)
z.scores(c(TRUE ,TRUE ,FALSE ,TRUE))

```
